## Scatterplots
```{r}
plot(DelPrete$Index_AP_inlet, DelPrete$femur_head_adjusted_1.715, main="Index AP Inlet vs. Femur Head Adjusted", xlab="Index AP Inlet", ylab="Femur Head Adjusted")

plot(DelPrete$Index_bispinous, DelPrete$femur_head_adjusted_1.715, main="Index Bispinous vs. Femur Head Adjusted", xlab="Index Bispinous", ylab ="Femur Head Adjusted")

plot(DelPrete$Index_TD_outlet, DelPrete$femur_head_adjusted_1.715, main="Index TD Outlet vs. Femur Head Adjusted", xlab="Index TD Outlet", ylab="Femur Head Adjusted")

plot(DelPrete$Index_pelvic_breadth, DelPrete$GM, xlab ="Index Pelvic Breadth", ylab="Geometric Mean", main ="Pelvic Breadth vs. GM")

plot(DelPrete$Index_pelvic_breadth, DelPrete$femur_head_adjusted_1.715, xlab ="Index Pelvic Breadth", ylab="Femur Head Adjusted", main ="Pelvic Breadth vs. Femur Head")

plot(DelPrete$Index_AP_outlet, DelPrete$GM, xlab ="Index AP Outlet", ylab="Geometric Mean", main="AP Outlet vs. GM")

plot(DelPrete$Index_AP_outlet, DelPrete$femur_head_adjusted_1.715, xlab ="Index AP Outlet", ylab="Femur Head Adjusted", main = "AP Outlet vs. Femur Head")
```
